name: Internet_slugTest
description: Unit tests for the slug generation functionality in the Internet class.

test_cases.name: testSlugWithNullInputs
test_cases.description: Tests the slug generation with null inputs for both words and glue.

test_cases.name: testSlugWithNonNullInputs
test_cases.description: Tests the slug generation with non-null inputs for both words and glue.

test_cases.name: testSlugWithNonNullWordsAndNullGlue
test_cases.description: Tests the slug generation with non-null words and null glue.

test_cases.name: testSlugWithNullWordsAndNonNullGlue
test_cases.description: Tests the slug generation with null words and non-null glue.
